Rules

You have the option to purchase a range of top-notch styles from Envato Elements at discounted rates, including stock videos, video templates, sound effects, graphic designs, slideshows, images, fonts, web designs, CMS templates, WordPress themes, 3D graphics, and more. You are able to enroll in all premium Udemy classes without any cost. You have the option to purchase the components for a reduced cost.
First of all you will register our apps, then set your profile to buy any products.Ready to go.
If you complete Registration part, then you need to login your account and browse your premium template.
If you complete to read previous instructions then you will prepare to use it. Thank you.
If you will try any unethical works in this apps, then we will remove your account and make inactive in our network

টাকা পাঠানোর পরে করনীয়ঃ-
১। টাকা পাঠানোর পরে নিজের অর্ডার সেকশনে গিয়ে নিজের রিসিপ্ট ডাউনলোড করে নিশ্চিত হোন। 
২। পেমেন্ট সংক্রান্ত কোন সমস্যায় পড়লে +8801955554447 নম্বরে whatsapp এ যোগাযোগ করুন । 
৩। আমাদের সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন +8801955554447 (whatsapp) এবং trodevit@gmail.com এই ইমেইল এ।

Privacy Policy for TroVato\nAt TroVato, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors.This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by TroVato and how we use it.If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

\nLog Files\nTroVato follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they use app. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the app, tracking users\' movement on the app, and gathering demographic information.

\nPrivacy Policies\nYou may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of TroVato. Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on TroVato. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on this app or other apps or websites. Note that TroVato has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

\nThird Party Privacy Policies\nTrodev\'s Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

\nChildren\'s Information\nAnother part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity. TroVato does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our App, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
\nConsent\nBy using our app, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its Terms and Conditions.

Trovato is a sister company of the Trodev Group. TroVato gives you the support you need to improve your education system in this era of procrastination. Many premium files are provided for a fraction of the cost to prepare you for where you will take yourself in this age of prosperity. \n\nNowadays, many students are working towards becoming graphic designers, video editors, or software developers themselves, but as students, many times they cannot afford to buy valuable things, so we have come up with very low prices that are within the reach of students. Providing different premium files, which are all premium products of Envato Elements, Freepik, Coursera, Udemy Course, Motion Array. Which a student can buy and use very easily.
